## ColorCache.clear() method

Clears the cache. Only references to the THREE.Color are removed from the cache. Consequently, clearing the cache does not cause any negative visual impact.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clear(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
